div.p: Hoosic Valley Central School Curriculum and Instructional Technology

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-ibL1re purZT-AhqUyc-ibL1re pSzOP-AhqUyc-ibL1re jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

div.p: Together, the Hoosic Valley Community and surrounding district communities are collaborating to provide resources to our youth during this unprecedented time. Thank you to our sister school districts for sharing resources with each other. This site will link you numerous resources to enrich the learning experience of students. Please note that while most links are open, some may have limited access. This site is fluid and will change accordingly. If you would like to share resources to be included on this site, please email the Director of Curriculum and Instructional Technology Dr. Lisa Cala Ruud at lcalaruud@hoosicvalley.k12.ny.us.
**All technology related questions should be sent to TechTeam@hoosicvalley.k12.ny.us **
